SENT.plain: Heteroantisera were raised in rabbits against human thymocytes or Burkitt's lymphoma EBI cells
After suitable absorption, the sera were specific for thymocytes and T lymphoblasts, or B lymphoblasts and several lymphoblastoid cell lines
The specificity of the antisera was confirmed by preparing purified populations of T or B lymphocytes on immunoabsorbent columns, followed by mitogenic stimulation with phytohemagglutinin
The antisera did not react with normal resting lymphocytes
